Welcome to FWOSS™

Founded in 2002, FWOSS create effective bespoke software, and develop really great websites that deliver a real return on your investment.

There's always a reason behind wanting (or needing) a website, or some bespoke software. At FWOSS, we really specialise in listening to what your end / ongoing goal is, and then developing and implementing a strategy to ensure you reach it. Come and talk to us and we'll show you what we mean.

Want to do it yourself?

If you want to be able to manage your website yourselves, you'll find our content management system fwossFRESH easy and powerful to use, with full e-commerce facilities, and great results in search engines. It maintains excellent website accessibility, too.

Where we are & who we work with

Based in South Wales, we work with a really wide ranging client base at FWOSS, in both public and private sectors, ranging from local shops to listed plcs to universities.

Why you should work with us

Well, we could go on about this one for a while, but our clients say that we get them great results on time and to budget ... and that we're fun to work with.

fwossFRESH: redefining content management

fwossFRESH is our content management system, and we're really proud of it. It'll let you have complete control over your website content, quickly and easily, with no technical knowledge required at all.

XML based and designed with search engine optimisation and accessibility firmly in mind, fwossFRESH is easy to use however non-technical you might be. (We've already said that, but just in case you didn't see it, we thought we'd say it again).

As fwossFRESH is a modular CMS, you can have it just as you want it. It's currently in use across a variety of different websites for organisations ranging from universities to shops to county councils.
